analysis.description:
Reentrancy in OrderManageContract.executeOrder (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#826-851):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(ERC20(token20).balanceOf(address(this)) >= repaymentSum) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#840-842)
	- lastRepaymentSum = ERC20(token20).balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#843-844)
	- require(bool)(safeErc20Transfer(taker,repaymentSum)) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#845)
	- PledgeContract(owner)._conclude() (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#846)
	External calls sending eth:
	- taker.transfer(repaymentSum) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#839-840)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- status (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#846-850)

Reentrancy in OrderManageContract.takerOrder (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#788-819):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token20 != address(0) && ERC20(token20).balanceOf(address(this)) > 0) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#810-813)
	- outLoanSum = ERC20(token20).balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#813)
	- require(bool)(safeErc20Transfer(maker,outLoanSum)) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#814)
	External calls sending eth:
	- maker.transfer(outLoanSum) (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#809-810)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- status (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#815-818)

AddressUtils.isContract (/unique_contracts/0xfa3445a89f72454909203d602c152b36c2b3f0aa.sol#156-166) is declared view but contains assembly code
